subject: Re: [junit] All Methods Public
msgSnippet: Wow - Looks like someone put some thought into this ... Thanks - Good stuff, - Ole ...
messageBody:
Wow - Looks like someone put some thought into this
:-)

Thanks - Good stuff,
- Ole

> and still having a

> perhaps?
>
> Cheers, Ilja
